Installation or modification of unauthor.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 on endpoints for processes creating files or running commands typically associated with browser extension installation paths or utilities. Correlate process creation events with file system monitoring logs (if available, or infer from command line) to detect unauthorized writes in extension directories.

Network traffic patterns originating fro.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log, Zeek dns.log
Network traffic patterns originating fro.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log, http.log, and dns.log for network connections originating from endpoints. Filter for connections associated with browser processes (if identifiable). Identify connections to known malicious IPs/domains by inner joining logs with CTI feeds. Use time series analysis and descriptive statistics on connection volume, destination frequency, and data transfer size to detect deviations from baseline user or group browser activity indicative of C2 or data exfiltration.
